menuDetails.dishDescription: This wholesome dish contains 3 medium pcs of tender chicken, marinated in spices, cooked with seeraga samba aromatic rice in healthy sunflower oil & laced with ghee. This also includes 1 egg.
This biryani contains 3 medium pieces of tender mutton, marinated in spices, curd and cooked with seeraga samba rice in healthy sunflower oil & ghee. This also Includes 1 Egg.
Biryani comprising of 2 boiled eggs with seeraga samba rice cooked to perfection with aromatic spices in healthy sunflower oil.

dishImage: https://foodyhivestorage.blob.core.windows.net/assets/dishimages/thumbnails/Hoskote Chicken Dum Biryani With Boiled Egg.jpg
menuDetails.dishName: HOSKOTE CHICKEN DUM BIRYANI WITH BOILED EGG
menuDetails.dishDescription: This biryani is prepared from Sonamosuri rice which is unpolished rice, hence higher fiber and nutrient content than ordinary dum biryani. Prepared with freshly ground spices, halal chicken, this biryani comes with an egg too!

dishImage: https://foodyhivestorage.blob.core.windows.net/assets/dishimages/thumbnails/Talapakatti Chicken Dum Biryani with Boiled Egg.jpg
menuDetails.dishName: TALPAKATTI DUM CHICKEN BIRYANI WITH BOILED EGG
menuDetails.dishDescription: Thalappakatti Naatu Kozhi Biryani gets its taste from the aromatic jeera samba rice, chicken all blended in fresh masala powder.
Biryani made with Zeera samba rice comprising of 2 pc chicken cooked in flavourful spices.
Biryani made with Zeera samba rice comprising of 4 pc chicken cooked in flavourful spices served with dalcha and raita.
Biryani made with Zeera samba rice comprising of 10-12 pc prawns cooked in flavourful spices served with dalcha and raita. This is low in fat and contains good amount of protein.

Ambur Biryani is one of the famous biryani recipes of South India which emerged during the Nawab of Arcot's regime. Prepared mainly with Jeera Samba or seeraga samba rice and various spices like cinnamon, clove, cardamons carefully cooked with chicken.

Ambur Biryani is one of the famous biryani recipes of South India which emerged during the Nawab of Arcot's regime. Prepared mainly with Jeera Samba or seeraga samba rice and various spices like cinnamon, clove, cardamons carefully cooked with mutton.
Smoked and healthy chicken biryani made with Indian spices for a tandoori twist to regular biryani.

A truly native of Bengaluru, this steaming hot biryani is not prepared in layers like other biryanis but are cooked together. Flavored with aromatic ground green spices which gives it a distinct taste.

Thalpakattu Biriyani is prepared in slow dum cooking process with no store brought masala powder and everything is ground freshly at home. Basmati and bullet rice is used in the dish which serves as a wholesome meal.
This popular chicken curry is flavorful, blended with aromatic spices, ground coconut paste and cooked in healthy sunflower oil.  It contains 4 medium pieces of chicken and is good source of protein.
A great side dish, this South Indian pepper chicken is delicious, aromatic, hot & spicy and tastes equally good when paired with plain or flavoured rice.
Dry Boneless chicken pops with a masala twist can be taken as starters or side dish.
Chettinad style chicken chukka fry which is a treat for your taste buds as well as good source of protein.
This Mangalore fish curry is both fiery and tangy, with traditional ingredients like coconut, tamarind, and red chilies & many other home grounded masala.
Juicy beef meatballs and potatoes in red masala gravy that is a great side dish for beef lovers.
It's a Hyderabadi authentic dish which is cooked for hours with loads of grains,Chicken and special spices.
Hyderabadi Mutton Haleem, made with species, Fresh Mutton, Wheat all slow cooked for 5 to 6 hrs to form a rich thick and delicious dish.
a Hyderabadi flavourful spicy, dry fruit rich mutton stew tastes best when paired with rumali roti.
Afghani Chicken Curry is a delicious chicken recipe that is super creamy and rich in spices. It goes well with roti or parathas.
A perfect non-veg starter which is delicious, juicy, soft and goes amazingly well as a side dish too.
flavourful chicken prepared with fenugreek leaves i.e methi leaves which goes well with rice or paratha.

menuDetails.dishName: VEG MEAL-RICE, MULTIGRAIN ROTI, PALYA, SAMBAR, RASAM PICKLE
menuDetails.dishDescription: A simple, wholesome south Indian meal comprising of rice, roti, palya, sambar, rasam and pickle. Such meals are easy on the stomach and aids in bettter digestion.

menuDetails.dishName: ANDHRA THALI-CHAPATHI, RICE, PALYAM, DAL (PAPPU), SAMBAR, RASAM, PAPAD & CURD
menuDetails.dishDescription: A complete basic Andhra meal comprising of 2 chapathi, rice, 2 palyam, dal, sambar, rasam, papad and curd that is fulfilling and easy to digest.
A spicy rice dish which is a hot mix of rice, lentils, vegetables and spice mix

Flavored rice made with long grain rice, choice of vegetables and fresh herbs. It is served with dry aloo and raita for a complete meal. Seasonal fresh vegetables used here are good source of minerals and fiber.

Aloo paratha is a popular Indian dish which is filling, delicious and tastes divine with just simply curd or pickle.The mashed potatoes with spices and herbs are stuffed in a rolled dough and roasted on the tawa.
Sindhi Kadhi is a delicious recipe from Sindhi cuisine made with a combination of besan and vegetables.It serves as an amazing tangy accompaniment with rice.

dishImage: https://foodyhivestorage.blob.core.windows.net/assets/dishimages/thumbnails/Punjabi Kadi Pakoda With Long Grain Rice.jpg
menuDetails.dishName: PUNJABI KADI PAKODA + LONG GRAIN RICE
menuDetails.dishDescription: It comprises of deep fried fritters (pakora) that are dunked in a yogurt based curry made with besan (gram flour) and spices! It has a good balance of protein, carbs and fats.
Shahi Paneer is a true celebration of rich flavours and treasured spices. Paneer is cooked in lots of tomatoes, mild spices and nuts with fresh cream. It is good souurce of healthy fats and calcium.

Traditional Sindhi dish includes chana daal and 2 crisp pakwaan with chutney and onion coriander garnishing. With good amount of protein and fiber, this is a good choice for a delicious and comforting treat.
Amritsari Chole is an authentic punjabi dish made out of chickpeas, onion, tomatoes and variety of spices. This, paired with paneer stuffed kulcha is a great meal choice.

menuDetails.dishName: GUJARATHI UNDIYOO WITH PURIS AND SHRIKAND
menuDetails.dishDescription: It is a gujarathi mixed vegetable paired with puris and shrikhand, making it a wholesome meal to crave for something tasty as well as filling.

menuDetails.dishName: MAKAI KI ROTI + SARSOO KA SAAG WITH WHITE BUTTER AND JAGGERY
menuDetails.dishDescription: A delicious north Indian dish made with peas and cottage cheese which tastes divine with rotis, chapaties, pulao equally.
A delicious north Indian dish made with peas and cottage cheese which tastes divine with rotis, chapaties, pulao equally.
Light ghee rice paired with juicy peshwa chicken gravy. Incorporating ghee with hot rice has many health benefits including storage of fat solouble vitamins.

menuDetails.dishName: FISH MEAL THALI - RED/WHITE RICE, VEG CURRY, FISH CURRY, FISH FRY
menuDetails.dishDescription: Mangalore is famous for its Fish Thali, this authentic dish - which is comprised of a portion of red/white rice, a vegetable dish, a fish curry & on the side a tawa fried fish. This is a filling meal rich in omega fatty acids and good amount of fibre and proteins.
Simple and tasty meal containing idli or dosa served with mysore style chicken( Nati Koli Saru).

menuDetails.dishName: NON-VEG MEAL- RICE, ROTI/CHAPATI. CURRY - CHICKEN/MUTTON/EGG, , RASAM, PICKLE
menuDetails.dishDescription: a wholesome south indian non-veg meal comprising of either chicken, mutton or egg served with rice, Roti or Chappati, rasam and pickle.
Piping hot fresh tomato rice with 2 sardine or 1 macrikel pan fried. It is good souce of lycopene and omega fatty acids.

dishImage: https://foodyhivestorage.blob.core.windows.net/assets/dishimages/thumbnails/Hoskote Chicken Dum Biryani With Boiled Egg.jpg
menuDetails.dishName: FRUIT SALAD, PLAIN DAL, LAUKI SABZI WITH ROTI/CHAPATI/RICE
menuDetails.dishDescription: Add variety to your meals with this combination of seasonal fruits, pulses, vegetable and grains. Incorporating various food groups is essential in meeting your everyday nutrient demand. This is vegan friendly meal.

dishImage: https://foodyhivestorage.blob.core.windows.net/assets/dishimages/thumbnails/Hoskote Chicken Dum Biryani With Boiled Egg.jpg
menuDetails.dishName: GREEN GRAM DAL & BHINDI SABZI WITH ROTI/CHAPATI/RICE
menuDetails.dishDescription: Good amount of greens to add essential vitamins and minerals in your diet, without excessive oil or fats, this is a simple and wholesome meal.

dishImage: https://foodyhivestorage.blob.core.windows.net/assets/dishimages/thumbnails/Hoskote Chicken Dum Biryani With Boiled Egg.jpg
menuDetails.dishName: MULTIGRAIN ROTI WITH DAL & VEG SALAD
menuDetails.dishDescription: Increasing nutritional content with multigrain roti, paired with good amount of pulses and veg salad with dressing, this is sure to keep your body fit and healthy.

dishImage: https://foodyhivestorage.blob.core.windows.net/assets/dishimages/thumbnails/Hoskote Chicken Dum Biryani With Boiled Egg.jpg
menuDetails.dishDescription: Khichdi is a wholesome meal in itself, having a good ratio of grains, pulse, vegetables and condiments. Paired with sprout salad which is rich in vitamin C and essential minerals, and raita rich in fiber and acts a synbiotic, this combo is a good health choice.

dishImage: https://foodyhivestorage.blob.core.windows.net/assets/dishimages/thumbnails/Hoskote Chicken Dum Biryani With Boiled Egg.jpg
menuDetails.dishDescription: Rich in complex carbs, protein, calcium, vitamin A and other minerals, spinach with cottage cheese paired with brown rice or rotis are a great healthy and tasty option.

dishImage: https://foodyhivestorage.blob.core.windows.net/assets/dishimages/thumbnails/Hoskote Chicken Dum Biryani With Boiled Egg.jpg
menuDetails.dishDescription: Rich in protein and minerals, lentil curry with fenugreek rice is a flavourful and healthy combination.

dishImage: https://foodyhivestorage.blob.core.windows.net/assets/dishimages/thumbnails/Hoskote Chicken Dum Biryani With Boiled Egg.jpg
menuDetails.dishName: MULTIGRAIN ROTI, RAJMA, POMEGRANATE CUCUMBER CURD
menuDetails.dishDescription: This meal is rich in fiber, essential vitamins and minerals, protiens and complex carbs. The pomegranate cucumber curd acts as a synbiotic and maintains gut health.

dishImage: https://foodyhivestorage.blob.core.windows.net/assets/dishimages/thumbnails/Hoskote Chicken Dum Biryani With Boiled Egg.jpg
menuDetails.dishName: STEAMED/GRILLED CHICKEN WITH RICE & GREEN CHUTNEY
menuDetails.dishDescription: A flavourful and healthy meal rich in protein and retains much of its nutrients because of chicken being steamed or grilled with appropriate condiments.

dishImage: https://foodyhivestorage.blob.core.windows.net/assets/dishimages/thumbnails/Hoskote Chicken Dum Biryani With Boiled Egg.jpg
menuDetails.dishDescription: A great combination of pulao with colorful seasonal vegetables paired with manchurian or grilled chicken for a satisfying meal.

menuDetails.dishName: CHICKEN CURRY WITH BROWN RICE OR ROTIES/CHAPATI
menuDetails.dishDescription: Good amount of fiber and nutrients in brown rice or whole wheat paired with chicken curry to give a flavourful experience.
Simple lemonade to give the flavourful benefits of having electrolyte as well as vitamin C. Have it sweet or salty!
Refreshing drink with the beneficial effect of mint as a soothing agent which is great for digestion and brain health.
This is light, refreshing drink which can be prepared with milk as well. It provides good amount of carotene which is essential for your tissues, and eye health.
Rich in pigments, this drink is all the goodness of fiber, vitamin and minerals your body needs!
A satieting and healthy drink which good amount of minerals, proteins and energy.
Turmeric milk latte is great for the body with benfits of curcumin present in turmeric for its anti-inflammatory and antioxidant effects.
Popularly called as Gajar Ka Halwa, it is rich in beta carotene and fibre while being extremely delicious.
Custard is simple dessert prepared from sweetened milk, cream and can be with eggs or eggless. It tastes great with fresh fruits as well.
Suji halwa rich in dry fruits and nuts and aroma of ghee meets the sweet cravings just right.

Shrikhand made from hung curd is a non-calorie healthy dessert incorporated with flavours like elaichi, mano, orange etc. It is good source of calcium and both prebiotics and probiotics and thus maintains our gut health.
Fresh seasonal fruits rich in natural sugars, pigments, vitamins and minerals is a healthy and refreshing dessert.
Puff pastry with delicious filling like cheese, chicken, onions with stripped puff tops which serve just a right bite, freshly baked without any preservatives or additives.
Rich, moist, chocolaty freshly baked brownies which melts in the mouth.
Rich buttery base with real lemon filling without any use of artificial flavours, colors or additives. Freshly baked tart that tastes delicious.
This popular sweet dish from South India is a quick mouth melting dessert, soft and flavourful.
Freshly prepared icecream made out of milk, cream coffee and palm jaggery with no sugar, artificial color or flavour.
Freshly prepared icecream made out of milk, cream coffee and palm jaggery with no sugar, artificial color or flavour.
Freshly prepared icecream made out of milk, cream coffee and palm jaggery with no sugar, artificial color or flavour.
Ice cream made out of actual saffron strands from Kashmir, almonds from UAE, milk, cream and sugar. sugar free option is available too. Relish the icecreams made out of good quality ingredients.

Guilt free indulgence made out of good quality ingredients, freshly baked to cater sweet cravings.
Cupcakes without harmful additives freshly baked to cater choco cravings.

menuDetails.dishName: WHOLE WHEAT, OATS CHOCO CHIP CAKE
menuDetails.dishDescription: Made out of whole wheat and oats, this cake is rich in fiber, protein and beta-glucan which aids in controlling cholesterol, helps in digetion and maintains gut health. It is healthier alternative to cakes made out of refined flour and is loved by all specially kids who love chocochips.

menuDetails.dishName: WHOLE WHEAT, OATS, DRY FRUIT CAKE
menuDetails.dishDescription: Made out of whole wheat and oats, this cake is rich in fiber, protein and beta-glucan which aids in controlling cholesterol, helps in digetion and maintains gut health. It is healthier alternative to cakes made out of refined flour. Dry fruits are rich in phytonutrients and aids in better health.
Cookies made out of whole wheat and almond lead to a healthier option rich in fiber, Vitamin E, omega fatty acids, protein and being lower in calories, perfectly loved by elders and kids alike.

menuDetails.dishName: WHOLE WHEAT OATS & MILLETS WITH SEEDS COOKIES
menuDetails.dishDescription: A mix of whole wheat, oats, millets and seeds made in cookies is perfect for everyday health snacks that are kid friendly too. It is rich in essential minerals like zinc, selenium, manganese along with being high in fiber.

Made from fresh oranges, this conserve is like a sweet bitter marmalade with a hint of subtle heat from fiery ginger which complements the entire product really well as well as enhances the nutrition. Spread it on toast, try it on scones, yogurt,oatmeal or anyhow you like.
Add a spoonfull of tomato pickle to meals for a varied taste palate which is not too spicy. It is a good antioxidant and aids in better digestion.
Relish mangoes all year round with home made mango pickle made out of raw mangoes which is rich in vitamin C.
Ready to cook dosa batter with perfect proportion of grains, pulses and no colors or additives, to relish perfect dosa while also saving time.
Ready to cook vada batter with perfect proportion of grains, pulses and no colors or additives, to relish perfect vada while also saving time.
This is a great healthy veg option perfect for a comforting feeling. This is healthier than heavily fried noodles and retains much of its nutrients.
Quick and hot soup with the goodness of vegetables, chicken, noodles blending in aromatic affair.
Great option for someone looking for a warm, not too heavy dish. Steaming results in higher nutritional content.

White rice is staple for more than half of the world's population and is a great source of energy, amino acids and enzymes. it aids in better digestation and is best complemented with daal (pulses) in terms of amino acids.

Rich in fiber(bran) and essential germ layer, it has higher amounts of protien, dietary fiber, vitamins, minerals and oryzanol as compared to polished rice. It is great for diabetics, people with high cholesterol and obesity.

Rice with cumin seeds is a great combination which is non-sticky, flavourful prepared with ghee, cumin and fragnant spices. It goes well with almost any curry and is a great way to switch from monotonus meals.
Made with fresh methi leaves, spices and rice, this is a refreshing dish which also increases the nutritional value of ordinary rice.

Rotis prepared out of flours of Indian grains and millets like bajra, jowar, ragi, whole wheat etc. are rich in iron, fibre, vitamin B, calcium among being low in fats and healthy macronutrient source. Paired with nutritious curries, they are a great meal choice.
Roti and chapatti are a healthy option over fried products like puris. Made out of whole wheat flour, they are a good source of protein, fibre and minerals.

Adding additional benefits to ordinary roti by incorporating methi which is fenugreek leaves with appropriate condiments, they are great choice in terms of both taste and health.  Fenugreek is known fow lowering blood sugar leves, inflammation and cholesterol.
Khow Suey, a Burmese dish made out of noodles with coconut milk and vegetables, served with a variety of contrasting condiments.
Mexican Bowl comprising of red kidney beans(rajmaa), rice, salsa, salad, spring onion, capsicum, and gluacomole which is avocado based dip. Healthy, filling and adding variety to your diet!

Chinese meal combo comprisising of fried rice, hakka noodles served with delicious veg manchurian balls. Made with fresh ingredients, no MSG or additives, this meal is filling and tasty at the same time.

menuDetails.dishSubName: THAI GREEN CURRY WITH BASIL RICE & PAPAYA SALAD
menuDetails.dishDescription: COCONUT BASED CURRY WITH EXOTIC VEGETABLES Paired  WITH basil RICE and RAW PAPAYA SALAD
Foccacia bread with fresh vegetables and olives deliciously topped serve as a amazing side dish.
COCONUTDelicious pizza topped with pineapple, chicken cubes, onions, cheese and baked. Can be customized as per preference.
Chicken, mushroom ,herbs are baked in creamy cheesey white sauce
Chicken, mushroom ,herbs are baked in creamy cheesey white sauce

menuDetails.dishSubName: CHEESE SPINACH & CORN/CHICKEN,MUSHROOM & CHEESE,CHICKEN & CHEESE,CHICKEN PINEAPPLE & CHEESE,CHICKEN JALAPENOS & CHEESE, PULLED BEEF & CHEESE,HAM & CHEESE
menuDetails.dishDescription: It is folded pizza pocket with desired filling , cheese and sauses, freshly baked.

menuDetails.dishName: STUFFED PARATHA, CURD, STIR FRIED VEGETABLES,  PICKLE
menuDetails.dishDescription: Stuffed parathas are a quick, healthy and filling option in between work or meetings. They can be simply indulged equally well with both curd and pickle or stir-fried fresh vegetables, all prepared without excessive oil.

menuDetails.dishName: MULTIGRAIN ROTI,  CHANNA DAL, DRY ALOO,  SEWAI PAYASAM
menuDetails.dishDescription: Rotis prepared from multigrain flour not only increases fiber content but also takes care of essential nutrients. Paired with pulses, vegetable, dessert, this is a complete veg meal!

menuDetails.dishName: VEG CORN PULAO,  ALOO DUM, PARUPPU PAYASAM
menuDetails.dishDescription: Add variety to your diet with this savory plus sweet combination prepared all from fresh ingredients! Increase your nutrient intake by incorporating variety of veggies in pulao and also combination of pulse and milk in paruppu payasam is a must!

Corn Palak is an amazing preparation of nutrient-rich spinach and corn. They are not only complementary in flavor and texture but also in terms of looks! Absolutely enticing when eaten with chappati and paired with suji barfi to end your meal.

menuDetails.dishName: VEG UTHAPPAM, MINT CHUTNEY, WHEAT JAGGERY LADOO
menuDetails.dishDescription: Give a break to classic uttapum and try veg uttapum for a healthy and quick meal.It is a tasty south Indian recipe supplying good carbs and minerals. Pairing with a healthy dessert gives you much needed fiber and iron while also catering your sweet cravings.
